text:
These Are the Winners of Allure's Best of Beauty Awards for 2018

Our editors tested countless creams, colors, palettes, and peels, all in the name of beauty. These are the year's most effective, innovative, and awe-inspiring products in every category.
title: Award Winning Beauty Products & Reviews 2018
